item.title: Nokia + Windows Mobile = Let's Kick Some <InsertWMPhoneMakerName> Butt
item.author: shantanu@shantanugoel.com (Shantanu Goel)
item.description: As everyone knows, I’m an out-and-out Windows Mobile worshipper. It’s like a girlfriend, who is very difficult to manage and understand at first, but is a great source of joy if you know how to manage her. I don’t like any other phones now; the extensibility given by WM will do that to you. I also “admire” Nokia because of the quality and reliability they provide with their phones. Having worked for them in a project (Nokia Networks/Nokia Seimens Networks actually), I know how much testing they put in before releasing something.
